definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a spice, (usu. understood of tragacanth gum, exuding fr. astralagus bush, Di:Ge 27:25 and reff.; Now:Arch. i. 64 (and 249); cf. also Löw:§ 24; but = Ar. naka0’ah;un = naka9ah;un summitas rubicunda sive flores plantae (i.e. a certain plant, Frey), acc. to Hom:Aufsätze 4);—abs. ´[[נ]] Ge 37:25 ( + [[חְרִי]], [[לּט]] as merchandise), Ge 43:11 (+ id., also [[דְּבַשׁ]], [[בָּטְנִים]], [[שְׁקֵדִים]], as gift).
